tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE InsuranceClaims (
  claim_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id UUID,
  claim_date DATE,
  claim_amount DECIMAL,
  claim_status VARCHAR,
  claim_type VARCHAR,
  customer_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE Insurance_Claims (
claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
policy_number INT,
claim_date DATE,
claim_amount DECIMAL,
claim_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE insurance_claims (
    claim_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_number TEXT,
    claim_type TEXT,
    claim_amount DECIMAL,
    date_of_claim TIMESTAMP,
    policyholder_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE policyholders (
    policyholder_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    address TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE insurance_policies (
    policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_number TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    policyholder_id UUID
);
